textContent:
If you’re opening this, something’s weighing on your heart. Maybe you’re angry, maybe you're hurt… maybe I’ve said or done something again that I regret. I want you to know...I’m sorry. ðŸ¥º

Sometimes, I react too quickly. My anger gets loud, and I know it can hurt. But please believe me when I say, I never want to be the reason you feel unloved or distant.

I don’t always know how to manage my emotions the right way, but I’m trying. I really am. You matter to me so much, and I hate the thought of causing you pain, especially when you're the one person I want to protect from it. ðŸ¤§

So, if I was harsh, if my words have hurt you I want you to remember this...I didn’t mean to hurt you. You don’t deserve that. And I’ll always come back, not just with apologies, but with the effort to grow and be better for you… for us.ðŸ¤§

Please take your time. Cool down, breathe, do what you need. I’m not going anywhere.

I love you ðŸ¥ºðŸ©· even when I’m angry, even when you’re upset. Always. ðŸ¤§ðŸ˜­
